item.title: Apprentice News Reader (Level 1)
item.description: Show logs with difference each commit introduces with git whatchanged

item.title: Apprentice Investigator (Level 1)
item.description: Used git blame to annotate a file with information about how each line changed.

item.title: Apprentice Hunter (Level 2)
item.description: Used git bisect to perform a binary search to find which change introduced a bug.

item.title: Apprentice Hunter (Level 1)
item.description: Used git bisect to perform a binary search to find which change introduced a bug.

item.title: Apprentice Goldsmith (Level 1)
item.description: Reviewed patches before committing with git diff --cached.

item.title: Apprentice Gardner (Level 1)
item.description: Shows the commit ancestry graph with git show-branch

item.title: Dentist
item.description: Extracted patches using git log -p.

item.title: Caretaker
item.description: Added a .gitignore file to a repository.

item.title: Let there be light
item.description: Commit without a parent.

item.title: Apprentice Architect (Level 1)
item.description: Created a new repository with git init.

item.title: Master Historian (Level 7)
item.description: Investigate the commit log using git log.

item.title: Product Manager (Level 4)
item.description: Stash the changes in a dirty working directory away with git stash.

item.title: Apprentice Chimney Sweeper (Level 2)
item.description: Used git gc to run a number of housekeeping tasks on the current repository.

item.title: Seamstress (Level 4)
item.description: amended a commit with git commit --amend.

item.title: Socialite (Level 5)
item.description: pushed a branch to a remote repository using git push

item.title: Author (Level 5)
item.description: Made 2^Level commits using git commit.

item.title: Apprentice Thug (Level 3)
item.description: Forced pushed a branch with git push -f

item.title: Apprentice Miller (Level 3)
item.description: Add only part of a file to the stage 44 times with git add -p.

item.title: Apprentice Collector (Level 2)
item.description: Fetches named heads or tags from another repository with git fetch

item.title: Cleaning lady (Level 4)
item.description: Remove untracked files from the working tree with git clean
